text: Nameless Creek is a stream in Hancock County, Indiana, in the United States. Nameless Creek was so named in about 1830 when an early settler inquired about the name of a creek he had crossed, and upon learning it had no name, said, "It is a nameless creek", and the name stuck ever since. ==See also== *List of rivers of Indiana ==References== Category:Bodies of water of Hancock County, Indiana Category:Rivers of Indiana
title: Nameless Creek
